creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: two rows of brown glazed V-shaped applied decorative elements with brown bands underneath along front top edge; open doorway into hollow interior; lattice design, in brown glaze, on either side of doorway and on upper door jamb; incised brick-like design, glazed green, around podium and lower edges on upper structure
markings: [7018], on top side; Sotheby\'s sticker, on top side
portfolio: From From a large tileworks retinue
title: House
